segments.text: You won one million yuan in a lottery . What will you say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know . I'm too excited to say a word .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand . It's too good to be true , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , too good to be true .
segments.speaker: S2
